topic_metadata.title: Why 'where(block: true)' doesn't work with 'set block'?

posts.name: jsx97
posts.cooked:
#show quote: set block(above: 2em, below: 2em)

#lorem(25)

#quote[
  inline quote
]

#lorem(25)

#quote(block: true)[
  block quote
]

#lorem(25)

How can make it work for block quotes only? I tried to replace quote with quote.where(block: true), but thid didn’t help.

#show quote.where(block: true): set block(above: 2em, below: 2em)

I also tried to replace above: 2em, below: 2em with spacing: 2em, but this didn’t help either.
posts.raw:
```typ
#show quote: set block(above: 2em, below: 2em)

#lorem(25)

#quote[
  inline quote
]

#lorem(25)

#quote(block: true)[
  block quote
]

#lorem(25)
```

How can make it work for block quotes only? I tried to replace `quote` with `quote.where(block: true)`, but thid didn't help.

```typ
#show quote.where(block: true): set block(above: 2em, below: 2em)
```

I also tried to replace `above: 2em, below: 2em` with `spacing: 2em`, but this didn't help either.

posts.cooked:
It works for me using v0.11.1:

#show quote.where(block: true): set block(spacing: 5em)
// #show quote.where(block: true): block.with(spacing: 5em)
// #show quote.where(block: true): set block(above: 5em, below: 5em)

#lorem(25)

#quote[
  inline quote
]

#lorem(25)

#quote(block: true)[
  block quote
]

#lorem(25)

image776×428 48.9 KB

But there is a small caveat: To make a block quote with a border on the left side, like on GitHub - #4 by SillyFreak.
